translations.SPLASH1: Unlock the MANIA Meter or Rocket Reveals to keep the fun going!
translations.BONUS_GAME_INFO_LINE:
Line up 3 matching numbers
to win a prize
translations.GAME_ADJUSTMENTS_KNOWING_YOUR_LIMITS: Knowing your limit is always the best bet. Call 1-800-270-7117 for help.
translations.HOW_TO_PLAY3: Your Total Cost equals the number of tickets multiplied by the ticket cost.
translations.HOW_TO_PLAY4: To purchase the game, press PLAY or press the spacebar.
translations.HOW_TO_PLAY5: To play the game, press REVEAL ALL or press each ticket manually.
translations.HOW_TO_PLAY6: If any of the letters on Your Tickets match the Winning Letters, win the prize shown on that ticket.
translations.HOW_TO_PLAY7: Reveal an Envelope to play a mini game for a surprise win!
translations.HOW_TO_BONUS_1: Reveal 3 Wheel symbols to play the Bonus Wheel game for guaranteed prizes.
translations.HOW_TO_BONUS_2: Press the wheel to Spin it. You start with 10 spins.
translations.HOW_TO_BONUS_3: Match 3 numbers in a line to win the prize shown for that line.
translations.HOW_TO_PLAY_GAME_RULES1: For more details about the game refer to the [Game Rules].
